item.title: Trump calls on Senate Republicans to "get rid of the filibuster"
item.description: President Trump's call to terminate the filibuster could alter the ways the Senate and congressional dealmaking operate.

item.title: Low-income families face financial cliff as shutdown threatens aid
item.description: "I'm wondering how I'm going to be able to afford everything" if federal food aid is halted, one single mom said.

item.title: China sends 3 taikonauts, first live mammals ever, to its space station
item.description: China has sent a new crew to its Tiangong space station, including its youngest ever taikonaut, along with the first live mammals ever sent to the sta...

item.title: In New Jersey governor's race, Sherrill tries to tether Ciattarelli to Trump
item.description: Republican Jack Ciattarelli has a shot at winning 2025 New Jersey governor's race against Mikie Sherrill, after Democrats have held the office for two...

item.title: Judges say Trump administration must keep paying some SNAP benefits
item.description: Two federal judges on Friday said the Trump administration must tap into contingency funds to make SNAP payments during the government shutdown.
